name: Getting Closer
description: Light questions to warm up and get to know each other

prompts.text: What's the best vacation you've ever been on?
If you could have dinner with anyone, living or dead, who would it be?
What's a hobby you've always wanted to try but haven't yet?
What's your favorite childhood memory?
If you won the lottery tomorrow, what's the first thing you'd do?
What's the most spontaneous thing you've ever done?
What song always puts you in a good mood?
What's your go-to comfort food?
If you could live anywhere in the world, where would it be?
What's a skill you're proud of having?
What's the best gift you've ever received?
What's your favorite way to spend a lazy Sunday?
What's a movie that always makes you cry?
What's your earliest memory?
If you could master any instrument overnight, which would it be?
What's the most beautiful place you've ever seen?
What's a book that changed your perspective?
What's your favorite thing about your hometown?
What's the best piece of advice you've ever received?
What's something you're looking forward to in the next year?
What's a tradition you have that you love?
What fictional world would you want to live in?
What's the nicest thing someone has done for you?
What's your favorite season and why?
What's a small thing that brings you joy?
If you could learn any language instantly, which would it be?
What's the most interesting documentary you've watched?
What's your favorite family tradition?
What did you want to be when you grew up?
What's the best concert or live event you've attended?
What's something you're grateful for today?
What's your favorite way to relax after a long day?
What's the most adventurous food you've tried?
What's a pet peeve of yours?
What's the last thing that made you laugh out loud?
What's your favorite thing about yourself?
What's a guilty pleasure you have?
If you could have any superpower, what would it be?
What's the best meal you've ever had?
What's a random fact you find fascinating?
What's the most thoughtful gift you've given?
What's your morning routine like?
What's a dream you've had that stuck with you?
What's your favorite thing to do outdoors?
What's a cause you care deeply about?
What's the best surprise you've experienced?
What's your favorite podcast or YouTube channel?
What's a place on your bucket list?
What's the most recent new thing you learned?
What's something you collect or would like to collect?
